r.d: This is an extension to efficiently schedule IO, time and signal based events using the best available IO notification mechanism for your system. This is a port of libevent to the PHP infrastructure; the API is similar but not identical.
r.n:
Supports epoll(4), poll(2) and select(2) IO notification engines. Support for /dev/poll and kqueue is pending.
On Windows, currently only sockets can participate in the IO notification engine.
